# Pull Request Template â€” Mobile (Flutter)

## Summary

- One-line summary of the mobile change.

## Related issue / ticket

- Issue: [JIRA/Issue #]

## Type of change

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Docs

## Platforms affected

- [ ] Android
- [ ] iOS

## Breaking changes

- Any changes that require consumers to update (e.g., native plugin upgrades)?

## Testing / QA

- Devices/emulators tested (include OS versions)
- Steps to reproduce and expected result
- Build artifacts produced (apk/ipa path)

## Performance / Size

- Bundle size impact, notable performance notes

## Checklist

- [ ] Unit/widget tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration/E2E tests executed
- [ ] CI builds passing for both platforms
- [ ] Release notes updated
